title: Chapter 533
body:
Chapter 533

533 I’ll let you see

In total, there were a hundred and ten pieces, all of which sealed the souls of the sky corpse sect’s corpse guards.

...

Among them, Lv 1 martial King realm martial artists had the most, with 55 pieces.

There were thirty pieces of the second level of the martial King realm.

Lv 3 martial King realm pills, 19 pieces.

Lv 4 martial King realm, ten pieces.

Lv 5 martial King realm, three pieces.

Lv 6 martial King realm, two pieces.

Those at the LV 1 martial King realm would be rewarded with 2000 top-grade spiritual crystals.

Lv 2 martial King realm martial artists would be rewarded with 5000 top-grade spiritual crystals.

Lv 3 martial King realm martial artists would be rewarded with 10000 pieces of top-grade spiritual crystals.

Lv 4 martial King realm would be rewarded with 20000 pieces of spiritual crystals of the highest quality, Lv 5 martial King realm would be rewarded with 50000 pieces of spiritual crystals, and Lv 6 martial King realm would be rewarded with 100000 pieces of spiritual crystals of the highest quality.

The total reward of these soul-sealing crystals was 800000 pieces of top-quality spiritual crystals.

A big harvest, definitely a big harvest.

This time, Lu Ming’s total harvest was more than ten million best-grade spirit crystals.

This was a Supreme spiritual crystal, not a lower spiritual crystal.

And this was not even including the intent crystals.

He had struck it rich. Lu Ming had really struck it rich this time.

it’s a pity that my comprehension of the essence realm of heaven and earth isn’t deep enough. Otherwise, with so many resources, wouldn’t my cultivation be able to improve rapidly? ”

Lu Ming secretly felt that it was a pity.

next, I’ll have to comprehend the essence realm of heaven and earth with all my might. There’s also the Dragon God’s three absolutes and the nine Dragons heaven-treading steps.

Lu Ming decided on the direction of his cultivation.

The nine Dragons heaven-treading steps had both offensive and physical power. It was a divine level martial arts technique. Lu Ming would not slack off and would comprehend it whenever he had the time.

As for the three absolutes of the Dragon God, Lu Ming would not let his guard down since it was his main method of attack.

“Now, let’s go to the mission Hall and hand in the mission!”

Lu Ming sorted out his thoughts and walked towards the missions Hall.

There were still many people in the mission Hall.

Lu Ming discovered that most people were connected to the demonic scales plane.

Just as Lu Ming was about to walk towards the counter to accept missions from the cross-scales demon dimension, a cold voice was heard.

“Lu Ming, it’s you!”

Lu Ming was stunned. He turned around and his eyes turned slightly cold.

Three figures walked toward Lu Ming.

The person in the lead was an elder.

The Holy Light was the peak king who had gone to the eastern Palace, the Holy Light.

Behind sacred glory, there were two young men.

One of them was actually Sheng Wushuang, and the other looked like he was in his late twenties. Lu Ming did not know him.

The voice just now was from Sheng Wushuang.

“Lu Ming, you’re not dead yet?”

When sacred glory saw Lu Ming, a look of disbelief flashed in its eyes.

Sacred Jade and the rest wanted to kill Lu Ming in the demonic scales dimension. Sacred glory knew about this.

He had thought that Lu Ming would have died long ago.

Now, Lu Ming actually appeared in front of him in a lively manner. One could imagine the shock in his heart.

could it be that this little b * stard didn’t go to the demonic scales plane? or perhaps, shengyu and the others didn’t find him!

Holy light’s mind was spinning rapidly.

As for the fact that Lu Ming had killed shengyu and the rest, he would not even think about it as that was impossible.

Lu Ming’s eyes were cold as he looked at the sacred glory and sneered, ” “As an elder of the Empyrean heaven divine Palace, you actually wished for my death. Hehe, how laughable. It’s a pity that I’ve disappointed you.”

Lu Ming’s voice spread far and wide, attracting the attention of a group of people.

“How dare you, kid? what kind of attitude is this? How dare you speak to the glorious God elder like that? you’re being very disrespectful.”

Behind sacred glory, the unfamiliar young man shouted, looking very arrogant.

“Great disrespect? This old man has been waiting for me to die the moment he saw me. Why should I respect him? is there something wrong with your brain?”

Lu Ming chided loudly and looked at the young man from the corner of his eyes.

“You … You …”

The young man was so angry that he was trembling.

“How audacious!”

Shengyao shouted, his face extremely ugly.

If they were not in a public place, he would have slapped Lu Ming to death.

However, there were so many people here. Given his status, what he said just now was indeed inappropriate. He had been firmly held by Lu Ming and he could not find a reason to take action.

Lu Ming sneered. He could not be bothered with them and walked toward the mission counter.

Buzzzzzz!

At this moment, the young man behind sacred glory caught up with Lu Ming in a big stride and appeared in front of the mission counter before Lu Ming.

Then, he looked at Lu Ming with a mocking expression and said, ” kid, so you’re here to hand in a mission from the demonic scales dimension. Haha, what a coincidence. I entered the demonic scales dimension a while ago and was just about to hand in my mission.

He looked at Lu Ming contemptuously and continued, ” it’s not that I want to say this, but this mission is completely suitable for a rookie from the East like you. In my opinion, you’re already very lucky to be able to seal the souls of one or two Lv 1 martial King realm corpse guards.

which eye of yours saw that I’ve only sealed the souls of one or two first tier martial King realm corpse guards? ”

Lu Ming looked at the young man, amused.

“Oh, could it be that there are more than one or two, two or three pieces? Hahaha!”

The young man laughed in disdain.

“Who is that person? It looks like shengchuan is going to humiliate him.”

that’s right. This kid is quite bold to talk to the elder of the divine glory sect like that. It’s normal for shengchuan to seize the opportunity to humiliate him.

but he seems quite calm. Maybe he has some stock? ”

“What goods? it’s just an act.”

In the surroundings, some people saw that there was a show to watch, so they all gathered around and whispered.

Lu Ming had also heard that the young man was called Sheng Chuan.

At the side, Sheng Yao and Sheng Wushuang looked at Lu Ming with cold smiles.

Although he could not kill Lu Ming, it was good to see him embarrass himself.

Lu Ming looked at shengchuan indifferently and said slowly, ” “If that’s the case, then you should have gained a lot?”

it’s just so-so. But it’s more than you, without a doubt.

Shengchuan sneered.

“Oh? Since that’s the case, you can hand in the mission first and let me see it. ”

Lu Ming said indifferently.

“Alright! I’ll let you experience it!”

Shengchuan smiled smugly and waved his hand. A pile of soul-sealing crystals appeared on the counter.

Each piece of soul-sealing crystal was covered with a layer of faint black light. With one look, one could tell that all of them had sealed their souls.

so many pieces! There are actually more than 20 pieces!

more than twenty pieces means more than twenty corpse guards died at shengchuan’s hands. It’s really terrifying.

“It seems that shengchuan’s cultivation has improved again.”

As soon as they saw the soul-sealing crystal shengchuan took out, the crowd burst into discussions.

“Help me check!”

Shengchuan was even more proud of himself as he spoke to an old man on the mission counter.

On the task counter, the old man picked up the soul-sealing crystal and carefully examined it piece by piece.

A moment later, all the checks were completed.

there are a total of 21 soul-sealing crystals, and all of them have sealed the souls of the corpse guards. Among them, 13 are at the LV 1 martial King realm, five are at the LV 2, two are at the LV 3, and one is at the lower tier of the LV 4 martial King realm!

The old man announced.

“What? There’s even a lower tier King tier at Lv 4 martial King realm? Even a corpse guard at the lower tier King level died at Sheng Chuan’s hands, how terrifying!”

corpse guards are difficult to kill. With the refined corpse protecting them and holy river being able to kill them, his cultivation should have broken through to Lv 5 martial King realm.

Instantly, the surroundings were filled with discussions again.
